data.actual_result: as long as you are still held on to it, you can move it
data.short_description: Can move position of channel while you aren't in edit mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Have many text channels in a server - Server Settings - Channels - Set Sort Mode to Text Channel - Press and hold on a text channel to move it - move it up a slight bit - don't let go of text channel - hit done
